title: ISic003333. Honorific for Marcus Appuleius
body:
1[M(arco) Appuleio M(arci) f(ilio) Quir(ina) . 15.].[..]
2[. c. 30.adl]ecto in V
3[decurias ab Imp(eratore) Traiano Optimo Aug(usto) praef(ecto)] coh(ortis) [I]
4[Ul]p(iae) Tra[ian(ae) Cugern(orum) c(ivium) R(omanorum) donis donato ab Imp(eratore) Traiano]
5[Opt]imo Aug(usto) [bello Dacico hasta pura et corona . 7.]
6trib(uno) mil(itum) leg(ionis) [II Traia]n(ae) fort(is) pr[aef(ecto) alae . 9. proc(uratori)]
7Aug(usti) ab ann[on(a) ad Pu]teolos praef(ecto) cla[ssis Alexandrinae]
8L(ucius) Appuleius M(arci) f(ilius) Q[uir(ina) In]sulanus piissimo p[atri faciund(um) curavit]

1[...................···············]·[··]
2[······························...]ECTOINV
3[....................................]COH[.]
4[..]PTRA[......................................]
5[...]IMOAUG[............................·······]
6TRIBMILLEG[.......]NFORTPR[.......·········.....]
7AUGABANN[......]TEOLOSPRAEFCLA[................]
8LAPPULEIUSMFQ[.....]SULANUSPIISSIMOP[...................]

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Schäfer and Alföldy 2015

English translation

commentary
